snippet.title: F1® 22 | Features Trailer
snippet.description:
Redefine the race weekend with all-new cars, Sprint Races, circuit updates, and more when #F122game launches on July 1 for Xbox, PlayStation, and PC.

The new era awaits with overhauled physics and handling engines. Plus, get immersed in the thrill of Formula 1® with VR on PC for the first time.

Take on Pirelli Hot Laps in iconic supercars and experience F1® Life - your new social hub for your collection of supercars, fashion, items, and accessories.

Pre-order F1® 22 Champions Edition for three days early access and exclusive in-game content - https://www.ea.com/games/f1/f1-22/buy

Read more here - https://www.ea.com/en-gb/games/f1/f1-22/news/f1-2022-features

📘 Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/formula1game 

🐦 Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/formula1game 

📺 YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/formula1game 

📸 Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/formula1game 

🌍 Website: http://www.ea.com/games/f1/f1-22 

💬 Forums: https://answers.ea.com/t5/F1-Games/ct-p/f1-games-en

🏆 F1 Esports: http://www.f1esports.com 

#F122Features #F1Life
